mapper.update: UPDATE checkorder SET cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, checkdate = #{checkdate,jdbcType=DATE}, reservedate = #{reservedate,jdbcType=DATE}, leavedate = #{leavedate,jdbcType=DATE}, checktime = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIME}, reservetime = #{reservetime,jdbcType=TIME}, leavetime = #{leavetime,jdbcType=TIME}, orderstate = #{orderstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ordertype = #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paystate = #{paystate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cstate = #{cstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE idno = #{idno,jdbcType=CHAR} AND roomno = #{idno,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM customer WHERE idno = #{idno,jdbcType=CHAR} AND roomno = #{idno,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.select: SELECT *, COUNT(DISTINCT idno) FROM checkorder WHERE cstate="已预定" AND orderstate IN ("已付","未付") GROUP BY idno
